seo.description: Gallery of unique and award-winning urban and landscape photographs. In my works, I operate with light and pure form, giving the photographs a nostalgic expression.
seo.keywords: photography, landscape photography, urban photography, street photography, Polish photography, fine art, black and white photography
seo.title: Magda Chudzik | Photography
